ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: ListInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: List initialization with {0} or more items must be formatted with each item on its own line for better readability
rule.description:
List initializations with a minimum number of items must be formatted with each item on its own line to improve readability and maintainability. Lists with fewer items may remain on a single line.
To customize this rule, edit the minItems threshold in the XPath expression (default: 2).
